segments.text: Are you ready to order , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have steamed chicken , braised pork and Beijing roast duck and so on . Here's the menu . What would you like to have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let's try some braised pork , sweet and sour fish and some fried beans .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like anything to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just some soft drinks and only a bottle of beer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Wait for a moment , please .
segments.speaker: S1
